long_description: Suspend the Byer Hangover Hanging Chair from a sturdy tree branch or support in your home, then kick back and relax. The chair is designed to allow you to swing and rock in any direction. Polyester chair with padded seat lets you try out many different sitting positions. 300-lb. weight limit.
short_description: Suspend the Byer Hangover Hanging Chair from a sturdy tree branch or support in your home, then kick back and relax. The chair is designed to allow you to swing and rock in any direction.
